questions.question: Which of the following is a non-defining relative clause?

options.A: The student who won the prize is my cousin.
options.B: The trees which were planted last year are dying.
options.C: My sister, who works in a hospital, is coming home.
options.D: I am looking for a book that explains global warming.

questions.question: Change to Reported Speech: 'I am working on a new project,' said the engineer.

options.A: The engineer said that he was working on a new project.
options.B: The engineer says he is working on a new project.
options.C: The engineer told that he is working on a new project.
options.D: The engineer said he will be working on a new project.

questions.question: What does the term 'biodiversity' refer to?

options.A: The study of rocks and minerals.
options.C: The variety of life in a particular habitat.
options.D: The chemical composition of the atmosphere.

questions.question: In the sentence 'The dam, which provides electricity, is very large,' the relative pronoun 'which' refers to:
Which word is an antonym for 'renewable'?
Reported Question: 'Do you live in the city?' she asked me.

options.A: She asked me do I live in the city.
options.B: She asked me where I lived.
options.C: She asked me if I lived in the city.
options.D: She asked me if I live in the city.

questions.question: The prefix 're-' in 'reforestation' means:
Identify the relative pronoun used for people in a defining clause:
Which of the following is a formal way to express an opinion in an essay?
Reported Command: 'Plant more trees,' the teacher told the class.

options.A: The teacher told the class to plant more trees.
options.B: The teacher said the class must plant trees.
options.C: The teacher asked if the class plants trees.
options.D: The teacher told that trees should be planted.

questions.question: A defining relative clause is used to:

options.C: Identify exactly which person or thing we are talking about.

questions.question: Which of these is a synonym for 'mitigate'?
Reported Speech: 'I can help you,' he said.

options.A: He said that he can help me.
options.B: He says he could help me.
options.C: He said that he could help me.
options.D: He said he will help me.

questions.question: The word 'sustainable' most nearly means:

options.B: Capable of being continued for a long time.

questions.question: Which relative pronoun is used to show possession?
Change to Reported Speech: 'Where is the library?' he asked.

options.A: He asked where the library is.
options.B: He asked where was the library.
options.C: He asked where the library was.
options.D: He asked where the library will be.

questions.question: Which linking word shows a result?
The phrase 'Greenhouse effect' refers to:

options.A: The warming of the Earth's surface due to trapped gases.
options.B: The process of painting houses green.
options.C: The growth of plants in a controlled environment.
options.D: The cooling of the ocean's temperature.

questions.question: Reported Speech: 'I have finished my homework,' Sarah said.

options.A: Sarah said she has finished her homework.
options.B: Sarah says she had finished her homework.
options.C: Sarah said that she had finished her homework.
options.D: Sarah said she finishes her homework.

questions.question: Which of these is a non-renewable energy source?
Select the correctly punctuated non-defining clause:

options.A: My car, which is blue, is very old.
options.B: My car which is blue is very old.
options.C: My car, which is blue is very old.
options.D: My car which is blue, is very old.

questions.question: In Reported Speech, 'today' usually changes to:
The word 'urbanization' means:

options.A: The increase in the number of people living in cities.
options.C: The process of farming in the desert.
options.D: The reduction of the urban population.

questions.question: Which relative pronoun is used for animals or objects in defining clauses?
Reported Question: 'Are you coming to the meeting?' she asked.

options.A: She asked me if I was coming to the meeting.
options.B: She asked if I am coming to the meeting.
options.C: She asked whether was I coming.
options.D: She asked me to come to the meeting.

questions.question: Which word is a synonym for 'depletion'?
The relative clause in 'The village where I was born is small' is:
Change to Reported Speech: 'Open the window!' he said.

options.A: He told me to open the window.
options.B: He said that I open the window.
options.C: He asked if I open the window.
options.D: He said me to open the window.

questions.question: The term 'carbon footprint' measures:

options.A: The weight of carbon in the soil.
options.B: The size of a person's shoe.
options.C: The total amount of greenhouse gases produced by human activities.
options.D: The number of trees planted in a year.

questions.question: Which pronoun cannot be used in a non-defining relative clause?
Reported Speech: 'I will help you,' he promised.

options.A: He promised that he would help me.
options.B: He promised to he will help me.
options.D: He promised that he helps me.

questions.question: What is 'afforestation'?

options.C: The establishment of a forest in an area where there was no previous tree cover.

questions.question: Which of these is used for reported advice?
The suffix '-able' in 'sustainable' changes the word to a/an:
Identify the defining relative clause: 'The man who owns that car is my uncle.'

options.A: The man who owns that car

questions.question: Reported Question: 'What time is it?' she asked.

options.A: She asked what time was it.
options.B: She asked what was the time.
options.C: She asked what time it was.

questions.question: Which word is most related to 'ecology'?
Reported Speech: 'I don't like coffee,' she said.

options.A: She said she didn't like coffee.
options.B: She says she doesn't like coffee.
options.C: She told she doesn't like coffee.
options.D: She said she hasn't liked coffee.

questions.question: A synonym for 'conservation' is:
Which relative pronoun refers to a period of time?
Reported Speech: 'We are going on holiday,' they said.

options.A: They said they were going on holiday.
options.B: They said they go on holiday.
options.C: They told that they are going on holiday.
options.D: They said we were going on holiday.

questions.question: What is 'geothermal' energy?

options.C: Energy from the heat inside the Earth.

questions.question: Which of these is a correct reported request?

options.A: He asked me to lend him my pen.
options.B: He asked me if I lend him my pen.
options.C: He said to lend him my pen.
options.D: He told me lend him my pen.

questions.question: The word 'poverty' is an example of a/an:
Identify the relative pronoun: 'The reason why he left is a secret.'
Reported Speech: 'I have been to Paris,' he mentioned.

options.A: He mentioned that he had been to Paris.
options.B: He mentioned he has been to Paris.
options.C: He says he was in Paris.
options.D: He mentioned he will go to Paris.

questions.question: Environmental 'pollution' can be defined as:

options.C: The introduction of harmful substances into the environment.

questions.question: Reported Speech: 'You must study harder,' the father said.

options.A: The father said that he had to study harder.
options.B: The father said he must study harder.
options.C: The father said that he has to study harder.
options.D: The father said he will study harder.

questions.question: The opposite of 'rural' is:
Which relative pronoun is often omitted in defining clauses when it is the object?
